file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
security:
  - jwtBearer: []
info:
  title: Schul-Cloud Sync Service API
  description:
    This is the API specification for the Schul-Cloud Sync service.
    
  contact:
    name: support
    email: info@dbildungscloud.de
  license:
    name: GPL-3.0
    url: 'https://github.com/hpi-schul-cloud/schulcloud-server/blob/master/LICENSE'
  version: 1.0.0
components:
  securitySchemes:
    jwtBearer:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
  schemas:
    sync:
      description: TODO
    sync_list:
      description: TODO
      type: array
      items:
        type: object
        properties:
          errors:
            type: array
            items: 
              type: object
          success:
            type: boolean
        additionalProperties: true

paths:
  /sync:
    get:
      parameters:
        - description: the syncer to run.
          in: query
          name: target
          schema:
            type: string
          example: ldap
          required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/sync_list'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Trigger a Sync without data.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - sync
      security:
        - jwtBearer: []
    post:
      parameters:
        - description: target syncer
          in: query
          name: target
          schema:
            type: string
          example: ldap
          required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/sync_list'
        '401':
          description: not authenticated
        '500':
          description: general error
      description: Trigger a Sync with data.
      summary: ''
      tags:
        - sync
      security:
        - jwtBearer: []
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              additionalProperties: true
  
openapi: 3.0.2
tags:
  - name: sync
    description: A sync service.
